mapper.select: SELECT lec.*, aca.academyName lectureAcademy FROM lecture lec INNER JOIN academy aca ON lec.academyNo = aca.academyNo WHERE (lec.lectureName LIKE #{keyword} OR aca.academyName LIKE #{keyword}) ORDER BY lectureNo DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memberId, passwd, name, dateOfBirth, gender, tel, zipcode, address, addressDetail, email, regDate, lectureNo) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{gender}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{email}, SYSDATE(), #{lectureNo})
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, lec.lectureName lectureName, g1.groupName groupName1, g2.groupName groupName2, g3.groupName groupName3 FROM member m INNER JOIN lecture lec ON m.lectureNo = lec.lectureNo INNER JOIN grouplist g1 ON m.group1 = g1.groupNo INNER JOIN grouplist g2 ON m.group2 = g2.groupNo INNER JOIN grouplist g3 ON m.group3 = g3.groupNo WHERE m.memberId = #{memberId} AND m.passwd = #{passwd}
SELECT c.*, (SELECT COUNT(commentNo) FROM cbcomment WHERE boardNo = c.boardNo) commentNum FROM classboard c WHERE writer = #{memberId} ORDER BY boardNo DESC
SELECT f.*, (SELECT COUNT(commentNo) FROM fbcomment WHERE boardNo = f.boardNo) commentNum FROM freeboard f WHERE writer = #{memberId} ORDER BY boardNo DESC

SELECT g.*, gl.groupName groupName,
(SELECT COUNT(commentNo) FROM gbcomment WHERE boardNo = g.boardNo) commentNum FROM groupboard g INNER JOIN grouplist gl ON g.groupNo = gl.groupNo
WHERE writer = #{memberId} ORDER BY boardNo DESC
